description:
We are looking for a design intern, who is interested in learning about building prototypes with real user impact in the real world.   Understanding the main differences between true UI (figma, Sketch, Adobe) vs UX (Axure) tools.

This paid internship is ideal for a graduating senior or recently graduated student with a some experience in their field via other interships or personal projects.  Students or recently graduated individuals who are not afriad to challenge themselves, learn from their mistakes, and push themselves beyond their comfort zone are ideal for this role.

This role does have the opportunity to lead to full time employment.
